connectWalletPage.footerOne: By continuing, you agree to the

menu.walletNotConnected: Your wallet is not currently connected. This will impact transactions.

bodies.rateFluctuationInfo: The rate of %{assetName} you earn, the Annual Percentage Return (APR), typically fluctuates between 7% - 20%.
bodies.amountStakingInfo: You can stake any amount of %{assetName} and they’ll immediately begin earning rewards.
bodies.withdrawInfo: You can withdraw your rewards at any time, which requires a small gas fee around ~$.01.
bodies.unbondingInfo: When you unstake your tokens, they’ll remain locked for %{unbondingDays} days, during which time they won’t earn rewards. After the %{unbondingDays} days, your %{assetName} will return to your Primary Wallet.
bodies.slashingInfo: Staking is done through a validator. It’s incredibly rare, but if the validator you’ve staked with messes up by allowing false or incorrect transactions to go through, you could lose a part of your assets.
bodies.partnerInfo: We’ve mitigated this risk by partnering with a reputable validator—which has a secure, reliable, and audited infrastructure.

cosmosOverview.emptyWithdraws: Pending unstaking requests will show here.

foxyOverview.emptyWithdraws: Pending or active withdrawals will show here.

foxFarmingOverview.header: Deposit ETH-FOX LP tokens to %{opportunity} to earn
foxFarmingOverview.body: Approve and stake your liquidity tokens to earn bonus FOX rewards.
foxFarmingOverview.rewards: The rewards you earn will accrue automatically.

overview.noWithdrawals: You don't have any withdrawals to claim.

saversVaults.description: Earn yield on your %{asset} through the THORChain Savers Vaults. There is no lock up time, and rewards are accumulated automatically. Yield on THORChain comes from swap fees and block rewards. Single-sided yield is capped at half the double-sided yield of liquidity providers.
saversVaults.runePoolDescription: RUNEPool lets you earn more %{asset} by pooling your %{asset} with others. You don't have to pick specific pools, everyone shares in the overall performance.
saversVaults.runePoolOverviewDescription: RUNEPool optimizes RUNE usage by depositing it into all POL-enabled liquidity pools in THORChain. By pooling RUNE across these pools, participants earn the combined APY but face exposure to the aggregate impermanent loss. Instead of choosing individual pools, users benefit from the overall performance, effectively investing in a RUNE index and all THORChain POL-enabled assets. This simplifies liquidity provision and reduces individual risk.
saversVaults.vaultCapTooltip: Current maximum capacity for this vault
saversVaults.withdrawLockedTitle: You have to wait %{timeHuman} to withdraw.
saversVaults.haltedDescription: Please tweet at @THORChain to raise the caps!
saversVaults.dustAmountTooltip: A tiny amount of dust is required to identify your address, and will be reserved for later use, when you want to make a withdrawal
saversVaults.sendDustBody: You need to send some dust to this address to be able to withdraw.

risksBody.vaults: Refer to <link>this article</link> for risks involved with savers vaults.
risksBody.runePool: Refer to <link>this article</link> for risks involved with RUNEPool.

timeToBreakEven.title: Time to break even
timeToBreakEven.tooltip: Estimated time to cover deposit fees and earnings.

saversVaults.cannotDepositWhilePendingTx: Cannot deposit while Txs are pending
saversVaults.cannotWithdrawWhilePendingTx: Cannot withdraw while Txs are pending
saversVaults.agreeRunePool: I understand that RUNEPool has both a 30 day minimum lockup and a heightened risk of impermanent loss.

fetchingQuotes.title: Fetching Quotes
fetchingQuotes.description: Fetching quotes for this pair, this can take up to %{maxTimeSeconds} seconds

slippage.warning: High slippage tolerances can result in unfavorable trades.
slippage.lowSlippage: Slippage below 0.05% may result in a failed transaction.

sort.info: Select how you would like your quotes sorted.

trade.gasFeeExceedsTradeAmountThreshold: Gas fee exceeds %{percentage}% of trade amount
trade.noQuotesAvailableDescription: No available quotes found at this time. Try selecting another pair.
trade.slowSwapBody: This swap may take a few minutes to complete.
trade.thorSmartContractWalletUnsupported: The THORChain network currently does not support smart contract wallets.
trade.intoAssetSymbolBody: You can proceed with this trade, but transaction history for receiving %{assetSymbol} is temporarily unavailable
trade.changeAddressExplainer: When sending cryptocurrencies on UTXO-based networks, any leftover funds from your transaction are sent back to you at this address.
trade.depositAddressExplainer: This is the protocol address where your funds will be sent for processing. Your hardware wallet will display this address for verification.
trade.customReceiveAddressDescription: Enter a custom receive address for this trade
trade.thisIsYourCustomReceiveAddress: This is your custom receive address

tooltip.noRateAvailable: This is often due to very limited or no liquidity on the trade pair.
tooltip.minerFee: This is the fee to process the transaction on the blockchain, this is not a fee charged by ShapeShift.
tooltip.protocolFee: This is the fee charged by the protocol selected to process this transaction, this is not a fee charged by ShapeShift
tooltip.inputOutputDifference: The estimated difference between the USD values of input and output amounts.
tooltip.slippageWithAmount: If the price moves so that you will receive less than %{amount}, your transaction will be reverted. This is the minimum amount you are guaranteed to receive.
tooltip.noRelatedAssets: This asset is only available on %{chainDisplayName}
tooltip.chainNotSupportedByWallet: This chain is not supported by your wallet. Switch to a different wallet to trade this asset.
tooltip.chainNotConnected: This chain is not connected to your wallet. Connect %{chainDisplayName} to trade this asset.

rateExpired.title: New Rate
rateExpired.body: Your previous swap rate has expired. We've fetched a new rate and updated your quote amounts. Please review the latest details before confirming your swap.

permit2Allowance.title: Permit2 contract allowance
permit2Allowance.tooltip: This trade uses Permit2, which requires a one-time approval to grant unlimited allowance to the Permit2 contract. After this initial setup, you can authorize trades on any Permit2-supported protocol by signing gas-free messages that grant temporary 5-minute allowances.

permit2Eip712.title: Permit token transfer
permit2Eip712.tooltip: This will grant %{swapperName} a 5-minute allowance to complete the trade on your behalf.

errors.title: Something went wrong
errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds for miner fee and amount
errors.noRouteFound: No routes found for this pair and amount
errors.intermediaryAssetNotSupportedByWallet: Intermediary asset %{assetSymbol}.%{chainSymbol} not supported by wallet
errors.tradingNotActiveNoAssetSymbol: Trades temporarily halted for this route

signing.failed: An error occurred signing the transaction

errors.quoteError: An error occurred getting a quote
errors.tradeFailed: Trade failed. Assets returned minus gas fee
errors.noQuotesAvailable: No quotes available for this trade
errors.unsafeQuote: This amount is below the recommended minimum for this pair (%{recommendedMin} %{symbol}). This could cause your trade to fail or loss of funds.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded, try again later
errors.maxSlippageExceededWithExpectedSlippage: The maximum allowed slippage tolerance for this trade has been exceeded during simulation. Expected slippage: %{expectedSlippage}%. Try again with a higher slipppage tolerance.
errors.executionRevertedWithExpectedSlippage: Execution reverted during execution. This may be due to insufficient slippage tolerance. Expected slippage: %{expectedSlippage}%. Try again with a higher slipppage tolerance.
errors.underMinimumAmount: One or more of the assets in this trade are below the minimum amount required for this trade.
errors.consumedMoreFees: The transaction did revert because the fees consumed by this trade were higher than expected.

trade.receiveAddressDescription: No %{chainName} address found from connected wallet. Manually enter an address
trade.disableThorTaprootReceive: We've detected that you're sending to a taproot Bitcoin address. Due to THORChain limitations, receiving BTC to a taproot address is not currently supported. Please enter another address.
trade.thorchainSwapperVolatilityAcknowledgemen: The THORCHain protocol is experiencing volatility. Proceed with extra caution and consider additional available routes.

quote.cantSetSlippage: We are unable to set a custom slippage (%{userSlippageFormatted}) for %{swapperName}

quote.slippage: This is the slippage on this quote.
quote.timeEstimate: This is the estimated time for this swap to complete.

limitOrder.heading: Limit

cancel.areYouSureYouWantToCancelOrder: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?

limitOrder.confirmInfo: The limit order may not fill exactly when on-chain prices reach the limit price.
limitOrder.limitPriceIsPercentLowerThanMarket: Limit price is %{percent}% lower than market price
limitOrder.highCowFeeImpact: CoW fee is %{percentage}% of your sell amount (%{cryptoImpact} %{sellAssetSymbol}). Your order may not execute.
limitOrder.explanation: When %{assetSymbol}'s price reaches %{limitPrice}, your limit order will automatically sell %{sellAmount}, ensuring you receive at least %{receiveAmount}.

errors.excessiveValidTo: Order expiry too far into the future

warnings.limitPriceIsPercentLowerThanMarket:
Price is %{percent}% below market.

While CoW always aims to get you the best available price, this could result in selling your %{sellAssetSymbol} at a loss. Consider clicking 'Market' instead.

usdtAllowanceReset.title: Unable to approve allowance for USDT
usdtAllowanceReset.description: Your current USDT allowance on Ethereum needs to be reset to 0 before it can be set to a sufficient value. Please revoke the current USDT token allowance and try again.

warning.insufficientBalance: Your wallet currently has insufficient %{symbol} balance on %{chainName} to execute this order. The order is still open and will become executable when you top up your %{symbol} balance on %{chainName}.
warning.insufficientAllowance: This order requires a additional allowance of %{symbol} on %{chainName} to be approved for CoW Swap to execute this order. The order is still open and will become executable when you complete the allowance approval.

popup.body: We've launched a secure window to complete your order.
popup.body2: Don't see the secure window? We'll help you re-launch the window to complete your order.

passphrase.body: After submitting your passphrase, use the button on the KeepKey to approve it

label.body: Labeling each of your devices allows you to easily distinguish one from the other.

recoverySettings.recoveryPassphraseDescription: If you are unsure if your recovery sentence is protected by a passphrase, leave this off.

recoverySentence.body: On your KeepKey screen, you will see your recovery sentence. Write it down. If you lose access to the device, your assets will ONLY be accessible by this sentence.
recoverySentence.infoFirst: It's critical you write it down exactly as it appears on the KeepKey.
recoverySentence.infoSecond: Never share your recovery sentence, it grants access to all of your funds.
recoverySentence.awaitingButtonPress: Follow the steps on your KeepKey to view your Recovery Sentence. Write it down!

factoryState.body: Your KeepKey is set to factory default settings. Create a new wallet, or restore a wallet using your secret recovery phrase

recoverySentenceEntry.body: Using the scrambled keyboard legend on your KeepKey, enter the first 4 letters of each word. If there are less than 4 letters in the word, press Enter, hit the space bar, or click next when you're done typing.
recoverySentenceEntry.awaitingButtonPress: Follow the instructions on your KeepKey to continue.

recoverySettingUp.body: Please wait while we initialize your device and sync your addresses.

recoveryInvalid.body: The Recovery Phrase you have entered is invalid.

disconnect.body: Unfortunately, an error occurred while recovering/setting up your KeepKey device. Please disconnect and reconnect your device and try setting up your KeepKey device again. If problem persists, please contact KeepKey support.

password.body: Enter your password to decrypt your wallet

error.length: Your password must be at least %{length} characters

backupPassphrase.title: Confirm Backup
backupPassphrase.description: Please tap the correct answer to seed phrases below.
backupPassphrase.desktopDescription: Complete this quick test to confirm you’ve saved everything correctly.

info.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
info.description: Write these 12 words down and store them securely offline. This 12 word phrase is used to recover your wallet private keys.
info.warning: Note: if you lose your Secret Recovery Phrase, ShapeShift can't help you recover your wallet and your funds will be lost forever.

success.title: Success
success.description: You have backed up your wallet. Remember to store your Secret Recovery Phrase somewhere safe.

error.title: Incorrect
error.description: One or more of the selected words were incorrect.

skip.title: Skip this step?
skip.description: Skipping the backup means you won’t be able to recover your wallet if you lose access to your device.
skip.confirmCta: Yes, I’ve saved my seed phrase

consolidate.body: ShapeShift honors %{asset}'s security design by using a new address for each transaction. To align with THORChain's protocol, which operates with a single address, we'll consolidate your funds into a single address.
consolidate.tooltip: Send funds to a single address for THORChain compatibility.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Address

errors.qrPermissions: This feature needs camera access permissions in order to work. Please change your browser settings.

connect.body: Connect a KeepKey device and click Pair.
connect.conflictingApp: Could not find your KeepKey. Another application may be trying to connect with your KeepKey.

pin.body: Use PIN layout shown on your device to find the location to press on the PIN pad.

descriptions.pin: The PIN is a combination of up to 9 numbers that you select after initializing your KeepKey. A PIN protects your device against unauthorized use in the event your KeepKey falls into the wrong hands.
descriptions.passphrase: Enable the ability to have multiple wallets, accessible by using a unique passphrase for each wallet.
descriptions.label: Labelling each of devices allows you to easily distinguish one from the other.
descriptions.timeout: Your device goes to sleep after 10 minutes of inactivity by default. However, you can change this.
descriptions.buttonPrompt: Press and hold the button on your KeepKey to change the device %{setting}.
descriptions.updateFailed: An error occurred whilst updating the %{setting}.

passphrase.title: Use with caution
passphrase.body: If you forget your passphrase, you will lose access to your funds.

descriptions.wipeKeepKey: I understand that by wiping my KeepKey I will lose access to my funds if I don't have my recovery phrase.

confirmations.wipeKeepKey: Press and hold the button on your KeepKey to confirm the reset to factory defaults.

checkboxes.wipeKeepKey: I have backed up my recovery phrase and understand what I am doing

metaMaskSnapConfirm.warningExperimental: The ShapeShift Multichain Snap is a new, experimental feature, provided "as is"
metaMaskSnapConfirm.warningBackup: Ensure you have backed up your MetaMask seed phrase. Any funds you send to non-EVM chains using this Snap will be directed to the default account you set up with MetaMask.

metaMaskSnapConfirm.agreeItem2: Only Account #0 in MetaMask is supported for the extra chains the ShapeShift Multichain Snap provides
metaMaskSnapConfirm.agreeItem3: To use the existing Ethereum chains provided by MetaMask, you must connect Account #0 to ShapeShift in MetaMask

import.body: Type or paste your Secret Recovery Phrase in all lower case with no commas or numbers and a single space between each word.
import.secretRecoveryPhraseError: Enter your Secret Recovery Phrase with a single space in between words. Omit any commas, returns, or any additional characters.
import.secretRecoveryPhraseTooShort: Secret Recovery Phrase is too short
import.keystoreImportBody: Import file by clicking Browse or by dragging and dropping it below.

password.body: Enter a strong password to encrypt your imported wallet. This is how you will access your wallet.
password.warning: Note: If you forget your password, ShapeShift can’t help you recover it.

create.body: Write these 12 words down and store them securely offline. This 12 word phrase is used to recover your wallet private keys.

start.body: You can have multiple ShapeShift wallets. You may load a wallet, import a wallet from a Secret Recovery Phrase, or create a new wallet.

onboarding.yourDecentralizedGateway: Your decentralization gateway. Trade and earn Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana and more from a single, secure wallet.
onboarding.crossChainFreedom: Cross chain freedom. Access the best rates across multiple decentralized exchanges, no middleman required.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.subTitle: Everything you need in one place

multiChain.title: Multi-Chain Support
multiChain.subTitle: Trade across multiple blockchains
multiChain.body: Access Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and many more chains from a single wallet. Seamlessly trade and manage your assets across different networks.

selfCustody.title: Self-Custody
selfCustody.subTitle: You own your keys, you own your crypto
selfCustody.body: Your wallet, your keys, your crypto. ShapeShift never has access to your funds. You maintain complete control over your assets at all times.

selectModal.body: By connecting a wallet, you agree to ShapeShift's Terms of Service and acknowledge that you have read and understand the ShapeShift disclaimer.

create.subHeader: Choose a nickname for your wallet
create.saveLocally: Your nickname is saved locally to your device.
create.visibleToYou: It will only be visible to you.

keepSafe.subHeader: Ensuring the safety of your Secret Recovery Phrase is crucial.
keepSafe.description: Treat your Secret Recovery Phrase like you would your most valuable possession – keep it secure at all times. A password manager is great security, writing the words down is even better.

bulletPoints.share: Don't share it with anyone else
bulletPoints.lose: If you lose it, we can't recover it

manualBackup.subHeader: Save your Secret Recovery Phrase in a secure place that only you control.
manualBackup.nextStep: Next you'll be asked to confirm the positions of certain words in your Secret Recovery Phrase.

success.title: You're in
success.description: You've verified your Secret Recovery Phrase. Be sure to store it securely - this is the only way to recover your wallet.

lending.estCollateralizationRatioDescription: A flat Collateralization Ratio of 200% is currently in place. In the future, a dynamic ratio will balance between the maximum and minimum CR based on market conditions.

lending.haltedAlert: THORFi services (Lending, Savers and RUNEPool) are currently paused on THORChain. We apologize for any inconvenience.

lending.title: What is THORChain Lending?
lending.body: Lending allows users to deposit native collateral, and then create a debt at a collateralization ratio (CR). The debt is always denominated in USD (aka TOR), regardless of what L1 asset the user receives

borrowing.title: How does borrowing work?
borrowing.body: Borrowing in THORChain involves using your deposited assets as collateral to take out a loan. The loan is denominated in USD (TOR) and can be received in various L1 assets. With a dynamic collateralization ratio, you can borrow flexibly without the worry of interest or liquidation

repayments.title: How does repayment work?
repayments.body: Repayment in THORChain is flexible, allowing you to repay at any time after your repayment lock has elapsed, and in any asset, which is then converted to TOR. The repayment amount is deducted from your debt balance, and proportional collateral is released back to you upon full repayment

errors.amountTooLowToReturnCollateral: Amount too low to return collateral
errors.amountTooLowToReturnCollateralTooltip: The repayment is too low for your collateral to be returned. Please try again with a higher amount, or repay a partial amount (which will not return your collateral, but will decrease your debt).
errors.amountTooSmallUnknownMinimumTooltip: The repayment amount you have entered is too small. Please try again with a higher amount.
errors.repaymentUnavailableTooltip: It is not possible to repay your loan yet. Please wait until the repayment lock has elapsed.
errors.repaymentsHaltedTooltip: Repayments are temporarily halted. Please try again later.

quote.collateral: Total asset amount which will be secured against your loan
quote.debt: Total debt you'll owe based on your new loan amount
quote.repaymentLock: Minimum period before you can repay your loan
quote.collateralizationRatio: Ratio of your collateral value to the loan amount
quote.feesPlusSlippage: Total fees occurred, including L1 fees, slippage, and THORChain liquidity fees

pools.unsupportedNetworksExplainer: Your wallet isn't connected to %{network1} and %{network2}. Please connect this chain or switch to a wallet that supports these networks.

yourPositions.emptyBody: Your active liquidity pool positions will appear here.

what.title: What is a Liquidity Pool?
what.body: A liquidity pool is a decentralized fund pool that contains assets used to facilitate trading on a blockchain network. It plays a crucial role in decentralized finance (DeFi) by providing liquidity for various trading pairs.

how.title: How do Liquidity Pools work?
how.body: Liquidity pools work on the principle of users depositing their assets into a smart contract to create a pool. These assets are then utilized to enable decentralized exchanges, allowing users to trade against the pool. In return for providing liquidity, users receive a share of the trading fees generated by the platform.

amm.title: Automated Market Makers (AMMs)
amm.body: Many liquidity pools operate as Automated Market Makers (AMMs), using algorithms to determine the price of assets based on the ratio of tokens in the pool. This allows for decentralized and continuous trading without the need for a traditional order book.

rewards.title: Earning Rewards
rewards.body: Liquidity providers earn rewards in the form of trading fees and, in some cases, additional governance tokens from the platform. These rewards are proportional to the amount of liquidity provided.

risks.title: Risks and Considerations
risks.body: While liquidity pools offer earning opportunities, it's important to be aware of the risks involved, including impermanent loss, smart contract vulnerabilities, and market volatility. Users should conduct thorough research before participating.

warningAcknowledgement.highSlippageDeposit: This deposit has high slippage (%{slippagePercentage}%). Proceed with caution.
warningAcknowledgement.highSlippageBorrow: This borrow has high slippage (%{slippagePercentage}%). Proceed with caution.
warningAcknowledgement.highSlippageTrade: This trade is impacted by price movement (%{slippagePercentage}%). Proceed with caution.
warningAcknowledgement.unsafeTrade: This trade may be unsafe or below the recommended minimum size, proceed with caution.
warningAcknowledgement.customToken: Anyone can create tokens, including fake ones, so caution is needed. Some tokens may not work with ShapeShift. By importing this token, you accept the risks. This token is not traded on major U.S. exchanges or frequently swapped on ShapeShift. Always research before trading.

RFOX.timeInPoolHelper: Time in pool is the longest living deposit into rFOX

what.title: What is rFOX?
what.body: rFOX is a term used to describe the benefits and rewards you receive when you stake your FOX tokens on Arbitrum. Currently, you lock and unlock vanilla FOX (on Arbitrum) tokens for staking emissions.

why.title: Why stake your FOX?
why.body: Staking your FOX allows you to earn regular RUNE payouts from the DAO's treasury, providing a steady stream of passive income in RUNE per epoch. Additionally, a portion of the RUNE received by the DAO is used to buy FOX from the open market and burn it, reducing the overall supply. Staking also supports the ShapeShift DAO's alignment with the THORChain ecosystem, contributing to their growth and success. The staking process requires a minimum 28-day unstaking period, encouraging commitment and stability within the community.

stake.title: How do I stake my FOX?
stake.body: To stake your FOX, you use the staking interface to lock your FOX tokens into the staking contract. You will need to sign a message or transaction to assign the address where your RUNE rewards will be paid. Once staked, you start earning RUNE rewards per block as part of your staking benefits.

unstake.title: What happens when I unstake?
unstake.body: When you decide to unstake, there is a minimum 28-day unstaking period. During this time, your FOX remains locked, and you cease to receive RUNE emissions. After the unstaking period, you can unlock and retrieve your regular FOX tokens.

cooldown.title: How long is the cooldown period?
cooldown.body: The cooldown period for unstaking FOX tokens is 28 days. During this time, your tokens remain locked and cannot be transferred.

multipleUnstaking.title: Can I have multiple unstaking amounts?
multipleUnstaking.body: Yes, you can have multiple unstaking amounts. Each unstaking action will have its own 28-day cooldown period.

connect.title: How do total fees collected, total FOX staked, emissions pool, and FOX burn amount connect?
connect.body: The fees collected by the DAO are in native RUNE. A portion of this RUNE is distributed to FOX stakers as rewards, while another portion is used to buy FOX from the open market and burn it, reducing the overall FOX supply. The total FOX staked influences the distribution of RUNE rewards, as rewards are distributed pro-rata based on the amount of FOX staked. The emissions pool represents the amount of FOX available for staking rewards, and the FOX burn amount is the portion of FOX purchased and burned using the RUNE collected from fees.

foxPage.description: Since 2019, our shapeshifting FOX Token has been offering users an ever-expanding world of utility and advantages. Today, our ERC-20 governance token gives you a share in revenues on THORChain, and enables you to influence the future of ShapeShift through your vote. Stake, swap, buy, supply, and manage your FOX holdings here.
